summary: Adds the Riptide sword from the \"Percy Jackson\" movie/books.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds the sword Riptide that Percy uses in the \"Percy Jackson\" movie/books.
Backround:
           In order to stop the vampire menace in the area, the jarl of Morthal requested to the College of Winterhold that they make a powerful sword that can kill any vampire.

Located: In the jarl\'s bedroom in Morthal.

Plese tell me what you think about it in the comments.
author: defcon05
